title: THE SABBATH GIRL: A NEW MUSICAL
description: A sparkling new musical about big-city life and the possibility of finding love when you least expect it – maybe even right down the hall. Book by Cary Gitter, Lyrics by Neil Berg & Cary Gitter, Music by Neil Berg, Conceived and Directed by Joe Brancato, featuring Marilyn Caserta, Diana DiMarzio, Rory Max Kaplan, Lauren Singerman, and Max Wolkowitz.
address: 59E59 Theaters, a quick block from SUBWAY 4/5/6 N/W/R at 59 St.
